column4: what happens when you adjust the speaker volume in alsamixer?
that was the first thing i check but i cant remember if i checked it in 11.10 or 10.04lts which is what iam running right now
let me double check
no sound and everything is checked and un-muted and turned up max
did it think you have more than one set of speakers?
ummm.... i dont think so
does your tablet have a headphone jack?
At the top it just has one tab "Sigmatec STAC975,59'
does it get sound through the headphones?
no
clearly the sound driver isn't working then
clearly.... i cant find linux drivers for it
alsa must think it has a driver for your sound chip, or else it wouldn't have shown you a mixer screen
what are my options now?
I'd suggest you ask at the Alsa forum. Because their driver for your sound chip is broken
and where is that? do they have an IRC
it appears there is at least #alsa channel here on freenode
nvm on the site i found it but do you if they have an IRC? and do you know anything about Wacom styluses?
sorry I don't know about wacom tablets
at least maybe the people on #alsa can help with your sound
true thank you for your help
those tools general come in the base install
